title: R&S artistic series die cut Baltimore for sale
author: edhans

posts.post_title: R&S artistic series die cut Baltimore for sale
posts.post_content:
$30.00 +$3.00 postage. Check or money order only. No PayPal. New York residents must pay sales tax. Please email me at [url]edhans@monkberry.com[/url]. No PMs, please. As always, "I'll take it" takes precedence over ongoing negotiations. 

Please visit my newly updated website here: [url]http://t206.monkberry.com/index.html[/url] with lots of new cards and many lowered prices. Thanks, and happy collecting.
